reference.title: Mis-programming contiguous hints
reference.shortdesc: In the case of a mis-programming contiguous hint, when there is a descriptor that contains a set CH bit, all contiguous VAs contained in this block should be included in the input VA address space that is defined for stage 1 by TxSZ for TTBx or for stage 2 by {SL0, T0SZ}.

section.p: The Cortexâ€‘A76 core treats such a block as not causing a translation fault.
